SEARCH
Package discorddb.sqlitedb

Class SQLDatabase

java.lang.Object
discorddb.sqlitedb.SQLDatabase
public class SQLDatabase extends Object
SQLDatabase represents a connection to an SQLite database using H2 as the database engine.
It contains several static methods that allow for creating and dropping tables, executing SQL queries, and backing up the database.

  • Method Details

    • createTable

      public static boolean createTable(String tableName, String... columns) throws SQLException
      Creates a new table in the database with the given name and columns.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table to create.
      columns - An array of column names and types to define the columns in the new table.
      Returns:
      true if the table was created successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while executing the SQL command.

    • getTable

      public static DatabaseTable getTable(String tableName)
      Gets the DatabaseTable object for the specified table name.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The DatabaseTable object for the specified table, or null if no such table exists.

    • dropAllTables

      public static boolean dropAllTables() throws SQLException
      Drops all tables in the database.
      Returns:
      true if all tables were dropped successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while executing the SQL command.

    • dropTable

      public static boolean dropTable(String tableName) throws SQLException
      Drops the specified table from the database.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table to drop.
      Returns:
      true if the table was dropped successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while executing the SQL command.

    • executeQuery

      public static ResultSet executeQuery(String sqlCommand) throws SQLException
      Executes a SQL query and returns the result set generated by the query.
      Parameters:
      sqlCommand - the SQL command to be executed
      Returns:
      the result set generated by the query
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or the SQL command syntax is invalid

    • execute

      public static boolean execute(String sqlCommand) throws SQLException
      Executes the given SQL command, which may be an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement, or an SQL statement that returns nothing, and returns a boolean value indicating the success of the command execution.
      Parameters:
      sqlCommand - the SQL command to be executed
      Returns:
      true if the command is an SQL statement that returns nothing, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or the SQL command syntax is invalid

    • backupDatabase

      public static boolean backupDatabase() throws SQLException
      Backs up the entire database to a zip file named 'database-backup.zip' and returns a boolean value indicating the success of the backup operation.
      Returns:
      true if the backup operation was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or the backup operation fails
